text: @NBCNews @GeorgeTakei One tries not being cold and insensitive, but he chose too play Russian Roulette (pardon the pun) with Covid19 and sadly he got the bullet. If others don’t learn from this tragic example of what not to be doing right now. Then they’re idiots.
